step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're doing great! Continue to keep your hands on your abdomen as you prepare to inhale.
Nice inhale through your nose! Remember to gently tighten your whole body muscles as you breathe in, visualizing fluid moving to your chest.
Well done exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you exhale.
Great start to your second repetition! Remember to sit or stand comfortably and place your hands on your abdomen.
You're doing well with this step. Keep your hands on your abdomen as you prepare for the inhale.
Excellent inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Fantastic exhale! Continue to relax your muscles and visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and exhaling through your mouth while relaxing. This helps stimulate lymphatic flow. Keep up the good work!
